document_data.mainbody:
he Marnu Cliffs were a series of cliffs in the Po Yul Dzayul Range in Tabot.
From the foot of the Marnu Cliffs emerged the Nam River, which rushed westward to fill Nam Tso. Hoshki Gompa stood nearby.
Tzu Wan, a hermit and oracle called the Entrusted, lived above the Marnu Cliffs around .
